name: Greatest Of All Turtle
description:
CLICK HERE FOR THE WEBGL VERSION

Tutorial:

  • Use mouse and keyboard to move
  • Red Blocks = Death
  • Yellow Blocks = Increased Jump Height
  • Shoes = Increased Jump Height (stacks with yellow blocks)

Failure is okay - Climb upon your past mistakes
